mapper.sql: SELECT * FROM( SELECT * FROM EXER_RECORD ORDER BY EXEREC_DATE DESC ) WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND TO_DATE(EXEREC_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_DATE(( SELECT MAX(EXEREC_DATE) FROM EXER_RECORD WHERE USER_ID=#{userId}), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert:
SELECT EXER_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO EXER_RECORD (USER_ID, EXEREC_DATE, EXEREC_WEIGHT, EXEREC_CONDITION, EXEREC_TIME, EXEREC_METER, EXEREC_ROUTIN, EXEREC_FEEDBACK, EXEREC_NO, EXERSUB_NO ) VALUES (#{userId}, CURRENT_DATE, #{exerecWeight}, #{exerecCondition}, #{exerecTime}, #{exerecMeter}, #{exerecRoution}, #{exerecFeedback}, 'EXR_'||#{eno}, #{exersubNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE EXER_RECORD SET EXERSUB_NO = #{exerecTime}, EXEREC_WEIGHT = #{exerecWeight}, EXEREC_CONDITION = #{exerecCondition}, EXEREC_TIME = #{exerecTime}, EXEREC_METER = #{exerecMeter}, EXEREC_ROUTIN = #{exerecRoution}, EXEREC_FEEDBACK = #{exerecFeedback} WHERE EXEREC_NO = #{exerecNo}
mapper.select:
SELECT R.EXEREC_DATE EXEREC_DATE, R.EXEREC_NO EXEREC_NO, R.EXERSUB_NO EXERSUB_NO, S.EXERSUB_NAME EXERSUB_NAME, R.EXEREC_CONDITION EXEREC_CONDITION, R.EXEREC_TIME EXEREC_TIME , ROUND(SUM(R.EXEREC_TIME*S.KCAL)) KCALS FROM (
) R JOIN EXER_SUB S ON R.EXERSUB_NO = S.EXERSUB_NO WHERE R.USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY R.EXEREC_TIME, R.EXEREC_DATE, R.EXEREC_NO, R.EXERSUB_NO, S.EXERSUB_NAME, R.EXEREC_CONDITION, S.KCAL

SELECT S.EXERSUB_NAME EXERSUB_NAME, COUNT(*) E_COUNT FROM (
) r JOIN EXER_SUB S ON R.EXERSUB_NO = S.EXERSUB_NO WHERE R.USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY EXERSUB_NAME
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT TO_DATE(EXEREC_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') EXEREC_DATE, EXEREC_WEIGHT FROM EXER_RECORD WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY 1 DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 7 ORDER BY 1
